item.title: Tradeweb 将在美国大选次日延长交易时间
item.description: 债券交易平台 Tradeweb 计划延长 11 月 6 日美国总统大选次日的交易时间，并在大选日提供隔夜支持。【原文：Bond trading platform Tradeweb plans to extend trading hours on Nov. 6, the day after the U.S. presidential election, and offer overnight support on Election Day.】

item.title: 凯雷向首席执行官出售在突尼斯马扎里能源公司（Mazarine Energy）的控股权
item.description: Mazarine 能源公司周四表示，私募股权巨头凯雷集团已将其在突尼斯石油和天然气生产商 Mazarine Energy 公司的多数股权出售给该公司首席执行官 Edward van Kersbergen。【原文：Private equity giant Carlyle Group has sold its majority holdings in Tunisia-focused oil and gas producer Mazarine Energy to the company's CEO Edward van Kersbergen, Mazarine said on Thursday.】

item.title: EIA 称美国 8 月石油产量创单月历史新高
item.description: 美国能源信息署（EIA）在其月度石油和天然气产量报告中称，8月份美国石油产量增长了1.5%，达到1340万桶/日，创下月度历史新高。【原文：U.S. oil production rose 1.5% in August to a monthly record high of 13.4 million barrels per day (bpd), the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) said in its monthly oil and natural gas production report.】

item.title: 调解员称普渡制药接近与萨克雷达成新的破产协议
item.description: 普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma）的一名法庭指定调解人周四表示，该公司即将与其所有者、富豪萨克勒家族成员以及州政府和地方政府达成新的破产和解协议，这些人提起诉讼，指控普渡制药的止痛药奥施康定（OxyContin）在美国引发了致命的阿片类药物成瘾危机。【原文：Purdue Pharma is close to a new bankruptcy settlement with its owners, members of the wealthy Sackler family, and state and local governments that have filed lawsuits alleging that its painkiller OxyContin spurred a deadly opioid addiction crisis in the U.S., a court-appointed mediator said Thursday.】

item.title: 伍德赛德公司与东京燃气公司商讨美国液化天然气项目股份事宜
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的人士透露，东京燃气公司正在与伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）就入股路易斯安那州价值数十亿美元的液化天然气（LNG）出口项目进行谈判。【原文：Tokyo Gas is in talks with Woodside Energy over taking a stake in a multi-billion-dollar Louisiana liquefied natural gas (LNG) export project, according to two people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 消息人士称，由于公司业绩下滑，福特将下调经理人奖金
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，福特汽车首席执行官吉姆-法利（Jim Farley）已告诉员工，该汽车制造商需要加快提高质量和降低成本的步伐，而与这些指标挂钩的经理奖金将被削减至总额的 65%。【原文：Ford Motor CEO Jim Farley has told employees that the automaker needs to speed efforts to improve quality and lower costs, and that manager bonuses, which are tied to those metrics, would be slashed to 65% of their total, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 洛杉矶县就塑料污染问题起诉百事公司和可口可乐公司
item.description: 洛杉矶县起诉饮料生产商百事可乐公司和可口可乐公司，指控它们用塑料瓶污染了这个美国人口最多的县，并在塑料容器的环境影响和可回收性方面误导公众。【原文：Los Angeles County has sued beverage makers PepsiCo and Coca-Cola , accusing them of polluting the most populous U.S. county with plastic bottles and misleading the public about the environmental impact and recyclability of their containers.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请德意志银行的 Rajendram 担任欧洲、中东和非洲地区消费者交易主管
item.description: 周四发布的一份员工备忘录显示，摩根大通已从竞争对手德意志银行聘请 Rumesh Rajendram 担任欧洲、中东和非洲地区消费者与零售并购业务主管。【原文：JPMorgan has hired Rumesh Rajendram from rival Deutsche Bank as head of consumer and retail M&A for EMEA, according to a staff memo distributed on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国金融公司被要求加强缓冲，防范类似 CrowdStrike 的事件
item.description: 英国市场监管机构周四表示，英国的金融公司必须做好准备，确保能够在 "严重但可信 "的情况下提供业务服务，如全球技术中断，以最大限度地减少对消费者和市场的影响。【原文：Financial companies in Britain must prepare to ensure they can deliver business services in "severe but plausible" scenarios, such as a global tech outage, to minimise any impact on consumers and markets, the markets regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商尼古拉季度亏损超预期，股价下跌
item.description: 尼古拉公司周四公布的季度亏损超过预期，该公司仍在努力应对与燃料电池电动卡车增产相关的高成本，导致这家电动汽车制造商的股价下跌超过 5%。【原文：Nikola reported a bigger-than-expected quarterly loss on Thursday as the company continues to grapple with high costs related to the production ramp up of its fuel-cell electric truck, sending the EV maker's shares down more than 5%.】

item.title: 谷歌为地图应用带来人工智能答案
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）周四宣布了一系列功能，将其人工智能聊天机器人 "双子座"（Gemini）纳入其地图应用程序套件。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Thursday announced a set of features that incorporated Gemini, its artificial intelligence chatbot, into its suite of mapping applications.】

item.title: 受成本压力影响，阿拉斯加航空预计第四季度利润低于街景预期
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团（Alaska Air Group）周四预测其第四季度利润低于分析师预期，原因是人员过剩和飞机交付延迟导致成本上升，从而削弱了利润率。【原文：Alaska Air Group forecast its fourth-quarter profit below analysts' expectations on Thursday, as higher costs associated with overstaffing and aircraft delivery delays dented margins.】

item.title: 福特综合服务主管离职加盟 Peloton
item.description: 福特汽车公司周四表示，负责领导该公司最重要团队之一的综合服务部门主管将在一年后离职。【原文：The head of Ford Motor's integrated services, who was tasked with leading one of the automaker's most important teams, is departing after about one year, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 福特将停止生产 F-150 Lightning 电动皮卡六周
item.description: 福特汽车公司周四表示，将停止生产 F-150 Lightning 电动汽车皮卡六周。【原文：Ford Motor said on Thursday it will halt production of F-150 Lightning electric vehicle pickup trucks for six weeks.】

item.title: 美国第三季度劳动力成本增幅为三年多来最小
item.description: 在工资增长降温的情况下，美国第三季度劳动力成本录得三年多来最小增幅，这表明通胀正坚定地呈下降趋势。【原文：U.S. labor costs recorded their smallest increase in more than three years in the third quarter amid cooling wage growth, indicating that inflation was firmly on a downward trend.】

item.title: 谷歌击败英国有关 YouTube 短裤名称的商标诉讼
item.description: 谷歌周四击败了一家英国短片公司就 YouTube 短视频平台 Shorts 提起的商标诉讼，伦敦高等法院裁定该平台不会给消费者带来混淆风险。【原文：Google on Thursday defeated a trademark lawsuit brought by a British short film company over YouTube's short video platform Shorts, with London's High Court ruling there was no risk of confusion for consumers.】

item.title: 西门子可能出售上市公司股份为 Altair 交易提供资金
item.description: 西门子首席财务官拉尔夫-托马斯（Ralf Thomas）周四表示，西门子可能会出售其在西门子医疗、西门子能源和 Fluence 的部分股份，以帮助其出资 106 亿美元收购 Altair。【原文：Siemens could sell off part of its stakes in Siemens Healthineers , Siemens Energy and Fluence to help fund its $10.6 billion Altair acquisition, Chief Financial Officer Ralf Thomas said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于需求稳定，品客制造商凯兰诺瓦的季度销售额和利润均超出预期
item.description: 包装食品公司凯兰诺瓦周四公布的第三季度销售额超过了华尔街的预期，原因是尽管价格上涨，但市场对其即食早餐和零食的需求依然强劲。【原文：Packaged food company Kellanova topped Wall Street estimates for third-quarter sales on Thursday, driven by resilient demand for its ready-to-eat breakfast items and snacks despite rising prices.】

item.title: 文件显示，民主党议员就华为产品采用台积电芯片一事抨击拜登
item.description: 民主党参议员马克-华纳（Mark Warner）批评拜登政府对台积电的监管 "明显松懈"，因为该台湾芯片制造商生产的一款芯片被披露最终用于中国受到严厉制裁的华为公司生产的产品中。【原文：Democratic Senator Mark Warner criticized the Biden administration for "apparent lax monitoring" of TSMC following revelations a chip produced by the Taiwanese chipmaker ended up in a product made by China's heavily sanctioned Huawei.】

item.title: 美国 9 月 PCE 通胀率如期上升
item.description: 美联储密切关注的美国商务部个人消费支出（PCE）物价指数在 8 月份增长 0.1%（未经修正）之后，9 月份又增长了 0.2%。经济学家此前预测 PCE 通胀率为 0.2%。【原文：The Commerce Department's personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index, closely watched by the Federal Reserve, increased 0.2% in September after an unrevised 0.1% gain in August. Economists had forecast PCE inflation climbing 0.2%.】

item.title: 巴西强劲的劳动力市场加剧了人们对加息预期前通胀的担忧
item.description: 在巴西央行下周做出利率决定之前，巴西劳动力市场公布了令人瞩目的数据，人们押注巴西利率制定委员会将因通胀风险而需要加快货币紧缩政策。【原文：Brazil's labor market is posting blockbuster numbers ahead of a central bank rate decision next week, amid bets that the country's rate-setting committee will need to speed up monetary tightening due to inflationary risks.】

item.title: 交易员坚持押注美联储 11 月和 12 月降息 25 个基点
item.description: 周四，短期利率期货交易者坚持押注美联储将在下周把美国短期借贷成本下调四分之一个百分点，并有可能在12月再次下调四分之一个百分点，因为经济数据显示物价上涨压力继续缓解。【原文：Traders of short-term interest-rate futures on Thursday stuck to bets the Federal Reserve will cut short-term U.S. borrowing costs by a quarter-of-a-percentage point next week, and likely again by that amount in December, after economic data suggested upward price pressures continue to ease.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份消费者支出超出预期
item.description: 9 月份，美国消费者支出增幅略高于预期，这使得美国经济在今年最后三个月的发展中步入了更高的增长轨道。【原文：U.S. consumer spending increased slightly more than expected in September, putting it and the economy on a higher growth trajectory heading into the final three months of the year.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，飓风影响逐渐减弱
item.description: 随着飓风造成的影响逐渐减弱，上周新申请失业的美国人数有所下降。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment fell last week as the distortions from hurricanes faded.】

item.title: 华为技术公司 1-9 月净利润下降 13.7
item.description: 中国华为技术公司[RIC:RIC:HWT.UL]周四公布，尽管收入增长了29.6%，但九个月净利润下降了13.7%。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies [RIC:RIC:HWT.UL] on Thursday reported a 13.7% drop in nine-month net profit despite a 29.6% revenue jump.】

item.title: 阿尔特里亚第三季度业绩好于预期，原因是对吸管和尼古丁袋的需求强劲
item.description: 奥特里亚集团（Altria Group）周四公布的第三季度营收和利润均超出市场预期，原因是尼古丁袋和电子烟的强劲需求帮助减轻了对其香烟类别的冲击。【原文：Altria Group beat market expectations for third-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, as robust demand for its nicotine pouches and e-cigarettes helped soften the hit to its cigarettes category.】

item.title: 万事达卡利润超预期 消费者支出恢复性增长
item.description: 周四，支付处理商万事达卡（Mastercard）公布的第三季度利润好于预期，原因是客户受到经济稳定的鼓舞而增加了消费。【原文：Payments processor Mastercard reported a better-than-expected profit for the third quarter on Thursday, as customers encouraged by economic stability ramped up their spending.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气出口将以 2016 年以来最小的速度增长
item.description: 据分析师估计，美国今年的液化天然气出口量将增长约2%，这是自2016年美国首家大型液化天然气出口工厂开业以来的最小年增幅，当时掀起的热潮推动美国生产商跃居世界天然气出口国之首。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas exports this year will rise about 2%, analysts estimate, the smallest annual increase since 2016 when the first big U.S. LNG export plant opened, launching a boom that drove the country's producers to the top of world gas exporters.】

item.title: 挪威邮轮公司门票销售额创历史新高，再次上调盈利预期
item.description: 挪威邮轮公司（Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings）受第三季度创纪录的收入和预售票房的鼓舞，周四第四次上调了今年的年度利润预期。【原文：Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings on Thursday raised its annual profit forecast for a fourth time this year, encouraged by record third-quarter revenue and advance ticket sales.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所母公司 ICE 季度利润因交易量强劲而增长
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange）周四公布，由于地缘政治风险和降息预期的变化，各类资产交易量强劲，第三季度利润增加。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange reported a higher third-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by strong trading volumes across asset classes due to geopolitical risks and shifting expectations of interest rate cuts.】
